title: [W]Response to ET1 claim (ET3)
responseLandingTxt1: [W]This response must be completed and submitted within 28 days of the date of the claim form being sent by the tribunal.
responseLandingTxt2: [W]You must provide your response to the claim even if you believe that another respondent is liable.
responseLandingTxt3,: [W]If you do not provide a response, a judgment may be issued against you without a hearing.
responseLandingTxt4: [W]If you consider another person or company may be liable, you should still submit a response. You can explain why you think someone else may be liable in the Contesting the claim section.
completeFormInfoTxt1: [W]the claimant's employment start and end dates, hours of work and notice period
completeFormInfoTxt2: [W]the claimant's pay and benefits, before and after tax
rememberTxt1: [W]you do not have to answer questions that are labelled optional
rememberTxt2: [W]you can review and edit your answers before you submit the form
rememberTxt3: [W]it can take an hour to complete the form, so save a draft version if you need to
